ValidationRule.description: [ZRM] Validación para mostrar un error al Agente Mediador si selecciona algún valor no permitido para ellos
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name = 'Agente Ventas' && ( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Interested, managed by my agent") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Not Zurich customer") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"No Recording Accepted") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Unreachable After Hours") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Maximum Attempts") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Robinson List") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"No cooperation") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Interested contact agent") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Error") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: [VR Oferta] El valor de Motivo de Pérdida seleccionado no es válido
